Game information:  

Meet the fully updated version of the classic multiplayer cooperative
game Gauntlet! Explore the dungeon at your own risk on their own or
play with up to 4 friends on the same screen in a networked cooperative
mode. But beware: in the fight for first place in the number of murders
or won gold friends can turn against you. Meet the four classic character
Gauntlet: warrior, valkyrie, elf and a wizard - a new look and a new unique
abilities. You can explore dungeons in search of gold and precious trophies
that will unlock the mystical relics, entitling the holders thereof
incredible new abilities. But be careful - if used improperly, these
abilities can cause irreparable damage to your party. Ingenious traps,
hordes of monsters, bosses most severe, and sometimes your friends will
lie in wait for you to get out of the way in the most unexpected and
incredible way.


RePack Features:  

Gauntlet
